transcript_text: Thank you for calling PC Recruiter. This is Mike. Yes, I left a message yesterday. Nobody called me back because I got my bill got charged. I mean, my credit card, which I didn't understand why, because I don't have PC Recruiter anymore. Got it. Hold on a second. Let's see what, give me a second. Are you with allied personnel? Yes. I don't believe, I don't, you have, I don't think I've paid for it for a while. I don't know what the history is. I mean, I canceled it, but have they been charging me all along? That I don't know, but I'll – let me see. Let's see. Let's see if someone from Billing is available right now. Thank you. So I don't think they're available. I can do is have, I'll create a ticket just to make sure something's logged and then I'll assign it over to the billing department to have them give you a call to fix that one that has already been charged and then confirm that you haven't been billed after you've Yeah, I don't know what they, why all of a sudden they got, I don't know what the deal is, you know, why all of a sudden did they charge me if they didn't, I don't know. I mean, I canceled it months ago, so I don't know. And I can't get it. I left a message yesterday. Nobody called me back. Yep, sorry about that. But I'll get a ticket submitted, and then I'll email billing at Main Sequence just to make sure it's on their radar and that somebody from there will give you a call. Yeah, they can call me on my cell phone, this phone number. Yep, I got it, 5680225. Yeah. Yeah. all right great I will have them give you a call on yourself and what is your name Mike last name is keys keys okay all right okay Mike okay thank you you're welcome bye bye

sentiment_analysis.summary: The customer is frustrated because he was unexpectedly charged for a PC Recruiter service that he had canceled months ago, and he has been unable to get a response from the company about this issue.

call_resolution.problem_statement: The customer was charged for a PC Recruiter service that they had previously cancelled, and they are seeking an explanation and resolution for the unexpected charge.
call_resolution.resolution_details: The employee was unable to immediately resolve the issue, but they created a ticket to have the billing department follow up with the customer to investigate the unexpected charge and confirm that the customer is no longer being billed.

follow_up.details: The billing department will call the customer on the provided phone number to address the issue.
follow_up.timeline: The billing department will call the customer as soon as possible.

missed_best_practices: The employee could not immediately resolve the issue and had to create a ticket for the billing department to follow up.
improvement_suggestions: The employee could have tried to reach out to the billing department directly during the call to get a more immediate resolution.
